description: Try our easy to follow Roast Pumpkin recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pumpkin,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Easter,Peanut free
name: Roast Pumpkin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cut pumpkins into 8 wedges and scoop out seeds. Brush wedges with butter and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 10 minutes. Drizzle with honey and cook for 20 minutes more or until tender and golden.
